# wcs-grid-custom-cell



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Overview

The grid custom cell is a subcomponent of `wcs-grid`.

## Properties

| Property   | Attribute   | Description                                         | Type     | Default     |
| ---------- | ----------- | --------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `columnId` | `column-id` | ID of the column for which to render the cell       | `string` | `undefined` |
| `rowId`    | `row-id`    | Key value of the object rendered for the cell's row | `any`    | `undefined` |


## Slots

| Slot                   | Description                                                     |
| ---------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------- |
| `"[columnId]-[rowId]"` | Auto-set slot to add the custom cell in the column of the table |


----------------------------------------------

*Built with [StencilJS](https://stenciljs.com/)*
